values.title: Jess C Scott
values.desc: When someone loves you the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable

values.title: GK Chesterton
values.desc: The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him but because he loves what is behind him

values.title: Gabriel Garca Mrquez
values.desc: sex is the consolation you have when you can't have love

values.title: Jack Kerouac
values.desc: My fault, my failure is not in the passions. I have but in my lack of control of them

values.title: Giacomo Casanova
values.desc: Be the flame, not the moth

values.title: Vincent Van Gogh
values.desc: A great fire burns within me but no one stops to warm themselves at it and passersby only see a wisp of smoke

values.title: Aldous Huxley
values.desc: I want to know what passion is, I want to feel something strongly

values.title: Jess C Scott The Intern
values.desc: Those sweet lips. My, oh my! I could kiss those lips all night long

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: If you have a strong purpose in life you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there

values.title: Jess C Scott
values.desc: I envy people that know love That have someone who takes them as they are

values.title: Jess C Scott
values.desc: The human body is the best work of art

values.title: mile Zola
values.desc: I would rather die of passion than of boredom

values.title: Jess C Scott
values.desc: A fit healthy bodythat is the best fashion statement
